name: OreLocalization.cardinalMk
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : Ring R
S : Submonoid R
inst✝ : OreLocalization.OreSet S
hS : LE.le S (nonZeroDivisorsRight R)
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (OreLocalization S R)) (Cardinal.mk R)
decl:
theorem cardinalMk (hS : S ≤ nonZeroDivisorsRight R) : #(OreLocalization S R) = #R :=
  le_antisymm (cardinalMk_le S) (mk_le_of_injective (numeratorHom_inj hS))
